definition: lasting for ages/long drawn out/remote in time or space/unhurried/a great number (of events)/preposterous/pensive
long or drawn out/remote in time or space/leisurely/to swing/pensive/worried
long or drawn out/remote in time or space/leisurely/to swing/pensive/worried
indifferent to the passing of time/careless

sentences.english: Dear Judy and Yoyo, thanks you very much for teaching us a lesson of life and love.
sentences.chinese: 鄭濤及悠悠，謝謝您們，讓我們上了這愛的一課。

sentences.english: My emotions went up and down the scale like a yo-yo.
sentences.chinese: 當時我的情緒就好象悠悠輪一樣忽上忽下。

sentences.english: Dishes are stacked unstably on acrobat's head.
sentences.chinese: 雜技演員頭上晃晃悠悠地頂着一疊磁碟。

sentences.english: The vast sea allows fishes to leap about, and open sky leaves birds to glide.
sentences.chinese: 海空任魚躍，天高任鳥飛，悠悠然自得其樂。

sentences.english: She roller skated across rather unsteadily.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着旱冰鞋晃晃悠悠地滑了過去。

sentences.english: The ink paper, filled with long book, full of deep memory.
sentences.chinese: 淡墨紙，瀰漫着悠悠書香，滿是濃濃記憶。

sentences.english: The gentle sunlight, the unhurried white clouds.
Australia is as old as time.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亞的古老如悠悠歲月。

sentences.english: Grandpa drank his coffee so slowly, and it tasted good.
sentences.chinese: 爺爺在慢悠悠地喝着他的咖啡，味道好極了。

sentences.english: He pedaled his bicycle slowly up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 他慢悠悠地騎着自行車上山。

sentences.english: Rereading it has no intention of the love letters, long time gradually old youth.
sentences.chinese: 無意重讀那年的情書，時光悠悠青春漸老。

sentences.english: “I guess.” Julia said as they sauntered off towards their classroom.
sentences.chinese: 她們晃晃悠悠地朝教室走去。

sentences.english: A clear blue sky, white clouds leisurely.
That makes the heavens be mute.
sentences.chinese: 使九天諦聽這樂聲悠悠。

definition: long or drawn out/remote in time or space/leisurely/to swing/pensive/worried
deep and somber/see also 窈窈[yao3 yao3]
to regret leaving/reluctant to part/(onom.) young leaves stir gently in the wind
bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
